=== About Me ===

I started Linux in 2001 with debian distribution, I developed cloud service based on Linux server and client several years in my own company before canonical. I joined Canonical in 2014 as part of the Support and Technical Services Engineering team. and I've been working on issue various area such as virtualization, openstack, userland server.
